entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %

Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: E 9 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
